sentence.Network_en: Have their own native language, an ethnic Mongolian Altaic.
sentence.Network_cn: 有自己本民族的语言, 属阿尔泰语系蒙古语族.

sentence.Network_en: Evenki and Mongolian belong to different branches of Altaic language family.
sentence.Network_cn: 鄂温克语和蒙古语分属于阿尔泰语系的不同语族.

sentence.Network_en: Use Daur language, belong to Altaic Mongolian tribe.
sentence.Network_cn: 使用达斡尔语, 属阿尔泰语系蒙古语族.

means.word_mean: 1. any member of the peoples speaking a language in the Altaic language group
2. a group of related languages spoken in Asia and southeastern Europe
